title: Game-Based Engineering Education Design: Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Offline game-based educational environment designed to enhance learning immersion and conceptual application skills for current practitioners, with activities tailored to smartphone-centric limited technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex engineering problems through game-based simulations and derive solutions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve conceptual understanding in the top 25% compared to peers based on game task performance records in formative assessments.
Learners revise their learning strategies over three times based on real-time feedback collected during game-based learning, enhancing self-directed learning skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
